CustomField.formula: IF (IntroHive__Potential_Introductions__c > 10, HYPERLINK("/apex/IntroHive__RequestIntroduction?contact_id=" & Id, IMAGE( "https://app.introhive.com/resource/images/salesforce/intros_10_plus.png", "Potential Introductions"), "_self"), IF (IntroHive__Potential_Introductions__c > 0, HYPERLINK("/apex/IntroHive__RequestIntroduction?contact_id=" & Id, IMAGE( "https://app.introhive.com/resource/images/salesforce/intros_" & TEXT(IntroHive__Potential_Introductions__c) & ".png", "Potential Introductions"), "_self"), "" ) )
CustomField.label: Find Introductions
